## `DisableSSLVerification`

Toggles whether SSL verification\index{web harvester!peer verification} used by the web harvester is disabled.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
DisableSSLVerification(bool disable)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `bool` disable | `true` to not use SSL verification. |
